text: @GovernorTomWolf @PaHouseDems Up Date: People are still dying in America from COVID19 & there is nothing that can stop it because "a thing" (money) has more value than a human life. At the rate of People dying in America, 300,000+ more people will be dead before the end of the year. Will you be alive in 2021?
